00104 void WMG::init(const int _N)
00105 {
00106     current_step_number = 0;
00107     gravity = 9.81; // hard-coded
00108 
00109     N = _N;
00110 
00111 
00112     X = new double[SMPC_NUM_VAR*N];
00113 
00114     T = new double[N];
00115     h = new double[N];
00116 
00117     angle = new double[N];
00118     zref_x = new double[N];
00119     zref_y = new double[N];
00120     fp_x = new double[N];
00121     fp_y = new double[N];
00122     lb = new double[2*N];
00123     ub = new double[2*N];
00124 
00125 
00126 
00128     def_constraint[0] = 0.09;
00129     def_constraint[1] = 0.025;
00130     def_constraint[2] = 0.03;
00131     def_constraint[3] = 0.025;
00132     def_repeat_times = 4;
00133 
00134     def_ds_constraint[0] = 0.07;
00135     def_ds_constraint[1] = 0.025;
00136     def_ds_constraint[2] = 0.025;
00137     def_ds_constraint[3] = 0.025;
00138     def_ds_num = 0;
00139 }

00149 void WMG::init_param(
00150         const double T_, 
00151         const double hCoM_,
00152         const double step_height_)
00153 {
00154     hCoM = hCoM_;      
00155 
00156     for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
00157     {
00158         T[i] = T_;
00159         h[i] = hCoM/gravity;
00160     }
00161 
00162     step_height = step_height_;
00163 }

00180 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00181         const double x_relative, 
00182         const double y_relative, 
00183         const double angle_relative, 
00184         const int n_this, 
00185         const int n, 
00186         const double *d, 
00187         const fs_type type)
00188 {
00189     def_constraint[0] = d[0];
00190     def_constraint[1] = d[1];
00191     def_constraint[2] = d[2];
00192     def_constraint[3] = d[3];
00193     def_repeat_times = n_this;
00194     def_ds_num = n - n_this;
00195     AddFootstep(x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative, type);
00196 }

00214 void WMG::AddFootstep(

00217         const double angle_relative, 
00218         const int n_this, 
00219         const int n, 
00220         const fs_type type)
00221 {
00222     def_repeat_times = n_this;
00223     def_ds_num = n - n_this;
00224     AddFootstep(x_relative, y_relative, angle_relative, type);
00225 }

00227 
00228 
00241 void WMG::AddFootstep(
00242         const double x_relative, 
00243         const double y_relative, 
00244         const double angle_relative, 
00245         fs_type type)
00246 {
00247     if (FS.size() == 0)
00248     {
00249         // this is the first ("virtual") step.
00250         if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00251         {
00252             type = FS_TYPE_DS;
00253         }
00254 
00255         Point2D zref_rel ((def_constraint[0] - def_constraint[2])/2, 0);
00256         Point2D zref_abs (
00257                 x_relative + zref_rel.x*cos(angle_relative) + zref_rel.y*sin(angle_relative),
00258                 y_relative - zref_rel.x*sin(angle_relative) + zref_rel.y*cos(angle_relative));
00259 
00260         FS.push_back(
00261                 FootStep(
00262                     angle_relative, 
00263                     Point2D(x_relative, y_relative),
00264                     zref_abs,
00265                     def_repeat_times, 
00266                     type,
00267                     def_constraint));
00268     }
00269     else
00270     {
00271         // Angle and position of the previous step
00272         double prev_a = FS.back().angle;
00273         Point2D prev_p(FS.back());        
00274 
00275         // determine type of the step
00276         if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00277         {
00278             switch (FS.back().type)
00279             {
00280                 case FS_TYPE_SS_L:
00281                     type = FS_TYPE_SS_R;
00282                     break;
00283                 case FS_TYPE_SS_R:
00284                     type = FS_TYPE_SS_L;
00285                     break;
00286                 case FS_TYPE_DS:
00287                 default:
00288                     type = FS_TYPE_SS_R;
00289                     break;
00290             }
00291         }
00292 
00293         // Position of the next step
00294         Point2D next_p(prev_p);        
00295         next_p.x += FS.back().ca*x_relative - FS.back().sa*y_relative;
00296         next_p.y += FS.back().sa*x_relative + FS.back().ca*y_relative;
00297 
00298         double next_angle = prev_a + angle_relative;
00299 
00300         Point2D zref_rel ((def_constraint[0] - def_constraint[2])/2, 0);
00301         Point2D next_zref (
00302                 next_p.x + zref_rel.x*cos(next_angle) + zref_rel.y*sin(next_angle),
00303                 next_p.y - zref_rel.x*sin(next_angle) + zref_rel.y*cos(next_angle));
00304 
00305         // Add double support constraints that lie between the
00306         // newly added step and the previous step
00307         for (int i = 0; i < def_ds_num; i++)
00308         {
00309             double theta = (double) (i+1)/(def_ds_num + 1);
00310             double ds_a = prev_a + angle_relative * theta;
00311 
00312             Point2D position ((1-theta)*prev_p.x + theta*next_p.x, (1-theta)*prev_p.y + theta*next_p.y);
00313             if (i < def_ds_num/2)
00314             {
00315                 FS.push_back(
00316                         FootStep(
00317                             ds_a, 
00318                             position,
00319                             FS.back().ZMPref,
00320                             1, 
00321                             FS_TYPE_DS,
00322                             def_ds_constraint));
00323             }
00324             else
00325             {
00326                 FS.push_back(
00327                         FootStep(
00328                             ds_a, 
00329                             position,
00330                             next_zref,
00331                             1, 
00332                             FS_TYPE_DS,
00333                             def_ds_constraint));
00334             }
00335         }
00336 
00337 
00338         // add the new step
00339         FS.push_back(
00340                 FootStep(
00341                     next_angle, 
00342                     next_p, 
00343                     next_zref,
00344                     def_repeat_times, 
00345                     type,
00346                     def_constraint));
00347     }    
00348 }

00351 
00362 int WMG::getNextSS(const int start_ind, const fs_type type)
00363 {
00364     int index = start_ind + 1;
00365     for (; index < (int) FS.size(); index++) 
00366     {
00367         if (FS[index].type != FS_TYPE_DS)
00368         {
00369             if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00370             {
00371                 break;
00372             }
00373             else
00374             {
00375                 if (FS[index].type == type)
00376                 {
00377                     break;
00378                 }
00379             }
00380         }
00381     }
00382     return (index);
00383 }

00386 
00397 int WMG::getPrevSS(const int start_ind, const fs_type type)
00398 {
00399     int index = start_ind - 1;
00400     for (; index >= 0; index--)
00401     {
00402         if (FS[index].type != FS_TYPE_DS)
00403         {
00404             if (type == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00405             {
00406                 break;
00407             }
00408             else
00409             {
00410                 if (FS[index].type == type)
00411                 {
00412                     break;
00413                 }
00414             }
00415         }
00416     }
00417     return (index);
00418 }

00420 
00421 
00442 fs_type WMG::getSwingFootNextPrevPos (
00443         double *prev_swing_pos,
00444         double *next_swing_pos,
00445         int *repeat_times,
00446         int *repeated_times)
00447 {
00448     fs_type cur_fs_type = FS[current_step_number].type;
00449     int next_swing_ind, prev_swing_ind;
00450     int next_ss_ind, prev_ss_ind;
00451 
00452     switch (cur_fs_type)
00453     {
00454         case FS_TYPE_SS_L:
00455         case FS_TYPE_SS_R:
00456             prev_swing_ind = getPrevSS (
00457                     current_step_number, 
00458                     (current_reference_foot == FS_TYPE_SS_R) ? FS_TYPE_SS_L : FS_TYPE_SS_R);
00459             next_swing_ind = getNextSS (
00460                     current_step_number, 
00461                     (current_reference_foot == FS_TYPE_SS_R) ? FS_TYPE_SS_L : FS_TYPE_SS_R);
00462 
00463             *repeat_times = FS[current_step_number].repeat_times;
00464             *repeated_times = *repeat_times - FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter;
00465             break;
00466 
00467         case FS_TYPE_DS:
00468             next_ss_ind = getNextSS (current_step_number);
00469             prev_ss_ind = getPrevSS (current_step_number);
00470             if (FS[next_ss_ind].type == current_reference_foot)
00471             {
00472                 next_swing_ind = prev_swing_ind = prev_ss_ind;
00473             }
00474             else
00475             {
00476                 next_swing_ind = prev_swing_ind = next_ss_ind;
00477             }
00478 
00479             *repeat_times = 0;
00480             *repeated_times = 0;
00481             break;
00482 
00483         case FS_TYPE_AUTO:
00484         default:
00485             // should never happen, since type is checked when steps are added.
00486             return (cur_fs_type);
00487     }
00488 
00489 
00490     prev_swing_pos[0] = FS[prev_swing_ind].x;
00491     prev_swing_pos[1] = FS[prev_swing_ind].y;
00492     prev_swing_pos[2] = FS[prev_swing_ind].angle;
00493 
00494     next_swing_pos[0] = FS[next_swing_ind].x;
00495     next_swing_pos[1] = FS[next_swing_ind].y;
00496     next_swing_pos[2] = FS[next_swing_ind].angle;
00497 
00498     return (cur_fs_type);
00499 }
00500 
00501 
00502 
00522 void WMG::getSwingFootPosition (
00523         const swing_foot_pos_type swing_type,
00524         const int loops_per_preview_iter,
00525         const int loops_in_current_preview,
00526         double *swing_foot_pos,
00527         double *angle_xy)
00528 {
00529     if (swing_type == WMG_SWING_2D_PARABOLA)
00530     {
00531         int num_iter_in_ss;
00532         int num_iter_in_ss_passed;
00533         double prev_swing_pos[3];
00534         double next_swing_pos[3];
00535 
00536         if (getSwingFootNextPrevPos(
00537                 prev_swing_pos,
00538                 next_swing_pos,
00539                 &num_iter_in_ss,
00540                 &num_iter_in_ss_passed) != FS_TYPE_DS)
00541         {
00542             double theta =
00543                 (double) (loops_per_preview_iter * num_iter_in_ss_passed + loops_in_current_preview) /
00544                 (loops_per_preview_iter * num_iter_in_ss);
00545 
00546             double x[3] = {
00547                 prev_swing_pos[0],
00548                 (prev_swing_pos[0] + next_swing_pos[0])/2,
00549                 next_swing_pos[0]};
00550 
00551             double b_coef = - (x[2]*x[2] - x[0]*x[0])/(x[2] - x[0]);
00552             double a = step_height / (x[1]*x[1] - x[0]*x[0] + b_coef*(x[1] - x[0]));
00553             double b = a * b_coef;
00554             double c = - a*x[0]*x[0] - b*x[0];
00555 
00556             swing_foot_pos[0] = (1-theta)*x[0] + theta*x[2]; // linear equation
00557             swing_foot_pos[1] = next_swing_pos[1];
00558             swing_foot_pos[2] = a * swing_foot_pos[0] * swing_foot_pos[0] + b * swing_foot_pos[0] + c;
00559         }
00560         else
00561         {
00562             swing_foot_pos[0] = next_swing_pos[0];
00563             swing_foot_pos[1] = next_swing_pos[1];
00564             swing_foot_pos[2] = 0.0;
00565         }
00566 
00567         *angle_xy = next_swing_pos[2];
00568     }
00569 }

00572 
00573 
00581 WMGret WMG::FormPreviewWindow(bool *switch_foot)
00582 {
00583     WMGret retval = WMG_OK;
00584     int win_step_num = current_step_number;
00585     int step_repeat_times = FS[win_step_num].repeat_counter;
00586 
00587 
00588     // If reference foot is unknown, this function is executed
00589     // for the first time: we need to use the next SS as the
00590     // reference foot, since the first SS must be fake.
00591     if (current_reference_foot == FS_TYPE_AUTO)
00592     {
00593         current_reference_foot = FS[getNextSS (win_step_num)].type;
00594     }
00595 
00596     // Indicate switch of the reference foot
00597     if (    // if we are not in the initial support
00598             (win_step_num != 0) && 
00599             // we are in DS
00600             (FS[win_step_num].type == FS_TYPE_DS) &&
00601             // the previous footstep was not DS
00602             (FS[win_step_num-1].type != FS_TYPE_DS) &&
00603             // this is the first iteration in DS
00604             (FS[win_step_num].repeat_counter == FS[win_step_num].repeat_times))
00605     {
00606         if (switch_foot != NULL)
00607         {
00608             *switch_foot = true;
00609         }
00610         current_reference_foot = FS[getNextSS (win_step_num)].type;
00611     }
00612     else
00613     {
00614         if (switch_foot != NULL)
00615         {
00616             *switch_foot = false;
00617         }
00618     }
00619 
00620 
00621     for (int i = 0; i < N;)
00622     {
00623         if (step_repeat_times > 0)
00624         {
00625             angle[i] = FS[win_step_num].angle;
00626 
00627             fp_x[i] = FS[win_step_num].x;
00628             fp_y[i] = FS[win_step_num].y;
00629 
00630 
00631             // ZMP reference coordinates
00632             zref_x[i] = FS[win_step_num].ZMPref.x;
00633             zref_y[i] = FS[win_step_num].ZMPref.y;
00634 
00635 
00636             lb[i*2] = -FS[win_step_num].d[2];
00637             ub[i*2] = FS[win_step_num].d[0];
00638 
00639             lb[i*2 + 1] = -FS[win_step_num].d[3];
00640             ub[i*2 + 1] = FS[win_step_num].d[1];
00641 
00642             step_repeat_times--;
00643             i++;
00644         }
00645         else
00646         {
00647             win_step_num++;
00648             if (win_step_num == (int) FS.size())
00649             {
00650                 retval = WMG_HALT;
00651                 break;
00652             }
00653             step_repeat_times = FS[win_step_num].repeat_counter;
00654         }
00655     }
00656 
00657 
00658     if (FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter == 0)
00659     {
00660         current_step_number++;
00661     }
00662 
00663     FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter--;
00664     if (FS[current_step_number].repeat_counter == 0)
00665     {
00666         current_step_number++;
00667     }
00668 
00669     return (retval);
00670 }

00673 
00680 void WMG::initABMatrices (const double sampling_time)
00681 {
00682     A = new double[9];
00683     B = new double[3];
00684 
00685     A[0] = A[4] = A[8] = 1;
00686     A[1] = A[2] = A[5] = 0;
00687     A[3] = A[7] = sampling_time;
00688     A[6] = sampling_time * sampling_time/2;
00689 
00690     B[0] = sampling_time * sampling_time * sampling_time / 6;
00691     B[1] = sampling_time * sampling_time/2;
00692     B[2] = sampling_time;
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 
00705 void WMG::calculateNextState (smpc::control &control, smpc::state_orig &state)
00706 {
00707     if ((A == NULL) || (B == NULL))
00708     {
00709         return;
00710     }
00711 
00712 
00713     state.x()  = state.x()  * A[0]
00714                + state.vx() * A[3]
00715                + state.ax() * A[6]
00716                + control.jx() * B[0];
00717 
00718     state.vx() = state.vx() * A[4]
00719                + state.ax() * A[7]
00720                + control.jx() * B[1];
00721 
00722     state.ax() = state.ax() * A[8]
00723                + control.jx() * B[2];
00724 
00725 
00726     state.y()  = state.y()  * A[0]
00727                + state.vy() * A[3]
00728                + state.ay() * A[6]
00729                + control.jy() * B[0];
00730 
00731     state.vy() = state.vy() * A[4]
00732                + state.ay() * A[7]
00733                + control.jy() * B[1];
00734 
00735     state.ay() = state.ay() * A[8]
00736                + control.jy() * B[2];
00737 }

00748 void WMG::FS2file(const std::string filename, const bool plot_ds)
00749 {
00750     
00751     FILE *file_op = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
00752     
00753     if(!file_op)
00754     {
00755         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot open file (for writing)\n");
00756         return;
00757     }
00758     
00759     fprintf(file_op,"%%\n%% Footsteps generated using the c++ version of the WMG\n%%\n\n");
00760     fprintf(file_op,"cla;\n");
00761     fprintf(file_op,"clear FS;\n\n");
00762     
00763     int i;
00764     for (i=0; i< (int) FS.size(); i++ )
00765     {
00766         if ((plot_ds) || (FS[i].type != FS_TYPE_DS))
00767         {
00768             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).a = %f;\nFS(%i).p = [%f;%f];\nFS(%i).d = [%f;%f;%f;%f];\n", 
00769                     i+1, FS[i].angle, 
00770                     i+1, FS[i].x, FS[i].y, 
00771                     i+1, FS[i].d[0], FS[i].d[1], FS[i].d[2], FS[i].d[3]);
00772 
00773             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).D = [%f %f;%f %f;%f %f;%f %f];\n", 
00774                     i+1, FS[i].D[0], FS[i].D[4],
00775                          FS[i].D[1], FS[i].D[5],
00776                          FS[i].D[2], FS[i].D[6],
00777                          FS[i].D[3], FS[i].D[7]); 
00778 
00779             fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).v = [%f %f; %f %f; %f %f; %f %f; %f %f];\n", 
00780                     i+1, FS[i].vert[0].x, FS[i].vert[0].y, 
00781                          FS[i].vert[1].x, FS[i].vert[1].y, 
00782                          FS[i].vert[2].x, FS[i].vert[2].y, 
00783                          FS[i].vert[3].x, FS[i].vert[3].y, 
00784                          FS[i].vert[0].x, FS[i].vert[0].y);
00785 
00786             if (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_DS)
00787             {
00788                 fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).type = 1;\n\n", i+1);
00789             }
00790             if ((FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS_L) || (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS_R))
00791             {
00792                 fprintf(file_op, "FS(%i).type = 2;\n\n", i+1);
00793             }
00794         }
00795     }
00796 
00797     fprintf(file_op,"hold on\n");    
00798     fprintf(file_op,"for i=1:length(FS)\n");
00799     fprintf(file_op,"    if FS(i).type == 1;\n");
00800     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','r','MarkerSize',2)\n");
00801     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).v(:,1), FS(i).v(:,2), 'c');\n");
00802     fprintf(file_op,"    end\n");
00803     fprintf(file_op,"    if FS(i).type == 2;\n");
00804     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).p(1),FS(i).p(2),'gs','MarkerFaceColor','g','MarkerSize',4)\n");
00805     fprintf(file_op,"        plot (FS(i).v(:,1), FS(i).v(:,2), 'r');\n");
00806     fprintf(file_op,"    end\n");
00807     fprintf(file_op,"end\n");
00808     fprintf(file_op,"grid on; %%axis equal\n");
00809     fclose(file_op);  
00810 }
00811 
00812 
00821 void WMG::getFootsteps(
00822         std::vector<double> & x_coord,
00823         std::vector<double> & y_coord,
00824         std::vector<double> & angle_rot)
00825 {
00826     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < FS.size(); i++)
00827     {
00828         if ((FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS_L) || (FS[i].type == FS_TYPE_SS_R))
00829         {
00830             x_coord.push_back(FS[i].x);
00831             y_coord.push_back(FS[i].y);
00832             angle_rot.push_back(FS[i].angle);
